title: Topics – The Ark, the Kingdom, and Hidden Scriptures
content: Series hub covering the Ark of the Covenant prophecies, Jewish roots, true Israel, Jesus and the Kingdom within, removed texts, and earliest scriptures.

title: Part 1 — The Prophecy & the Ark of the Covenant
content: Ark mystery, Jeremiah 3:16, 2 Maccabees 2:4–8 Mount Nebo tradition, Isaiah 2 Micah 4 restoration of Zion, Luke 17:21 Kingdom within, John 2:19–21 true Temple, new covenant on hearts Jer 31:33 Heb 8:10.

title: Part 2 — Faith and the Kingdom Within
content: Exploring faith as trust, Jesus' teaching of the Kingdom inside, ancient Hebrew faith traditions.

title: Part 3 — Hidden Scriptures & Lost Books
content: Study of removed texts, Book of Enoch, Jubilees, and their insights into angels, judgment, and prophecy.

title: Part 4 — Israel & the Covenant People
content: Tracing the true Israel, covenant identity, and spiritual lineage across generations.

title: Part 5 — The Kingdom Restored
content: Prophecies of restoration, Zion’s role, and the Kingdom’s manifestation on earth.

title: Part 6 — Temple & True Worship
content: From the Ark to the Temple, and Jesus as the true Temple. Worship in spirit and truth.

title: Part 7 — Prophets & Messengers
content: How prophets pointed to the Ark, the Messiah, and the Kingdom to come.

title: Part 8 — Jesus & the Hidden Kingdom
content: Exploring parables, sayings, and Kingdom teachings pointing to inner transformation.

title: Part 9 — The New Covenant
content: The covenant on hearts, Spirit-led faith, and freedom from old rituals.

title: Part 10 — Awaiting the Revelation
content: Final prophecies of the Ark revealed, the Kingdom fulfilled, and eternal hope.
